languages.text: {n}На лице Маражая расцветает самодовольная улыбка.{/n} "Караэль... Ты не растерял своих лизоблюдских навыков, лишившись хозяйки — что ж, они тебе еще пригодятся. Говори".

traits.locale_text: {n}На лице Маражая расцветает самодовольная улыбка.{/n} "Караэль. Ты не растерял своих лизоблюдских навыков, лишившись хозяйки. Что ж, говори".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}A smug smile blossoms on Marazhai's face.{/n} "Kharael... Your sycophantic skills have not dulled since you lost your mistress. They will be of use to you yet. Speak."
languages.original_text: {n}На лице Маражая расцветает самодовольная улыбка.{/n} "Караэль... Ты не растерял своих лизоблюдских навыков, лишившись хозяйки — что ж, они тебе еще пригодятся. Говори".

traits.locale_text: {n}A smug smile blossoms on Marazhai's face.{/n} "Kharael... You have not lost your sycophantic skills after losing your mistress. Well, they need not go to waste. Speak."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A smug smile blossoms on Marazhai's face.{/n} "Kharael... You have not lost your sycophantic skills after losing your mistress. Well, they need not go to waste. Speak."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A smug smile blossoms on Marazhai's face.{/n} "Kharael... Your sycophantic skills have not dulled since you lost your mistress. They will be of use to you yet. Speak."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A smug smile blossoms on Marazhai's face.{/n} "Kharael... Your sycophantic skills have not dulled since you lost your mistress. They will be of use to you yet. Speak."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein überhebliches Grinsen erblüht auf Marazhais Gesicht.{/n} "Kharael ... Eure kriecherischen Fähigkeiten sind nicht abgestumpft, seit Ihr Eure Herrin verloren habt. Sie werden Euch noch nützlich sein. Sprecht."
languages.original_text: {n}A smug smile blossoms on Marazhai's face.{/n} "Kharael... Your sycophantic skills have not dulled since you lost your mistress. They will be of use to you yet. Speak."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein überhebliches Grinsen erblüht auf Marazhais Gesicht.{/n} "Kharael ... Eure kriecherischen Fähigkeiten sind nicht abgestumpft, seit Ihr Eure Herrin verloren habt. Sie werden Euch noch nützlich sein. Sprecht."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋脸上绽放出得意的笑容。{/n}“卡瑞尔……即便是失去了女主人，你阿谀奉承的技巧也丝毫未减。你确实需要这些技巧，继续说吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}A smug smile blossoms on Marazhai's face.{/n} "Kharael... Your sycophantic skills have not dulled since you lost your mistress. They will be of use to you yet. Speak."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋脸上绽放出得意的笑容。{/n}“卡瑞尔……即便是失去了女主人，你阿谀奉承的技巧也丝毫未减。你确实需要这些技巧，继续说吧。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un sourire suffisant se dessine sur le visage de Marazhai.{/n} « Kharael... La perte de votre maîtresse n'a pas émoussé votre flagornerie. Elle vous sera encore utile. Parlez. »
languages.original_text: {n}A smug smile blossoms on Marazhai's face.{/n} "Kharael... Your sycophantic skills have not dulled since you lost your mistress. They will be of use to you yet. Speak."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire suffisant se dessine sur le visage de Marazhai.{/n} « Kharael... La perte de votre maîtresse n'a pas émoussé votre flagornerie. Elle vous sera encore utile. Parlez. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Una sonrisa arrogante aflora en la cara de Marazhai.{/n} «Kharael... tus habilidades como adulador no han decaído con la pérdida de tu señora. Aprovéchalas y habla».
languages.original_text: {n}A smug smile blossoms on Marazhai's face.{/n} "Kharael... Your sycophantic skills have not dulled since you lost your mistress. They will be of use to you yet. Speak."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sonrisa arrogante aflora en la cara de Marazhai.{/n} «Kharael... tus habilidades como adulador no han decaído con la pérdida de tu señora. Aprovéchalas y habla».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは満足そうに笑みをこぼした。{/n}「カラエル…己のミストレスを失ってからも、媚びへつらう特技は鈍っていないようだな。そいつはまだお前の役に立つだろう。さあ話せ」
languages.original_text: {n}A smug smile blossoms on Marazhai's face.{/n} "Kharael... Your sycophantic skills have not dulled since you lost your mistress. They will be of use to you yet. Speak."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは満足そうに笑みをこぼした。{/n}「カラエル…己のミストレスを失ってからも、媚びへつらう特技は鈍っていないようだな。そいつはまだお前の役に立つだろう。さあ話せ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzünde kendini beğenmiş bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Kharael. Hanımının ölümünden sonra da yalaka karakterinden hiçbir şey kaybetmemişsin. Bu durumun faydasını göreceksin. Konuş."
languages.original_text: {n}A smug smile blossoms on Marazhai's face.{/n} "Kharael... Your sycophantic skills have not dulled since you lost your mistress. They will be of use to you yet. Speak."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzünde kendini beğenmiş bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Kharael. Hanımını kaybetmiş olmana rağmen yalakalık yeteneklerin yerli yerinde duruyor. İşine yarayacaklardır. Konuş."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
